sourcesContent:
/** @format */ import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Button, TextField, Checkbox, Grid, FormControlLabel, Tab, Paper, Box, } from "@mui/material"; import { TabList, TabContext, TabPanel } from "@mui/lab"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import KeyboardArrowRightIcon from "@mui/icons-material/KeyboardArrowRight"; import { update_profile } from "../../store/actions/profile"; const Profile = ({ profile }) => { const [value, setValue] = React.useState("1"); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: "", email: "", mobile: 0, phone: 0, state: "", city: "", language: "", locate: false, search_active: false, law_school: "", grad_year: 0, bar_admit_date: "", undergrad_school: "", undergrad_area: "", undergrad_year: "", bar_no: "", admitted_practice: "", practice_time: "", longest_tenure: "", average_tenure: "", current_tenure: "", past_bar_companies_no: "", primary_area: "", }); const { username, email, mobile, phone, state, city, language, locate, search_active, law_school, grad_year, bar_admit_date, undergrad_school, undergrad_area, undergrad_year, bar_no, admitted_practice, practice_time, longest_tenure, average_tenure, current_tenure, past_bar_companies_no, primary_area, } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("sumited"); update_profile( username, email, mobile, phone, state, city, language, locate, search_active, law_school, grad_year, bar_admit_date, undergrad_school, undergrad_area, undergrad_year, bar_no, admitted_practice, practice_time, longest_tenure, average_tenure, current_tenure, past_bar_companies_no, primary_area, ); }; const handleChange = (event, newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; return ( onSubmit(e)}> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.username} disabled /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.mobile} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.phone} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.email} disabled /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.state} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.city} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.language} /> } label="Willing to locate" labelPlacement="start" id="locate" name="locate" value={locate} onChange={(e) => onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.locate} /> } label="Search Type (Active/ Passiv)" labelPlacement="start" id="search_active" name="search_active" value={search_active} onChange={(e) => onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.search_active} />

onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.law_school} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.grad_year} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.bar_admit_date} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.undergrad_school} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.undergrad_area} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.undergrad_year} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.bar_no} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.admitted_practice} />

onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.practice_time} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.longest_tenure} /> onChange(e)} id="average_tenure" name="average_tenure" defaultValue={profile.average_tenure} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.current_tenure} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.past_bar_companies_no} /> onChange(e)} defaultValue={profile.primary_area} /> ); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ // isAuthenticated: state.auth.isAuthenticated, user: state.auth.user, profile: state.auth.profile, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Profile);
